citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b) - A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection
process at 11:00 AM on 04/24/2014.
